trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> class is a read/write collection that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects.
Appends the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to append to this collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object that is appended to this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The object already exists in this collection.
schemaClass is `null`.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
Appends the contents of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> array to this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> array that contains the objects to append to this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The object already exists in this collection.
schemaClasses is `null`.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object has not yet been saved to the underlying directory store.
Appends the contents of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object to this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the objects to append to this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The object already exists in this collection.
schemaClasses is `null`.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object has not yet been saved to the underlying directory store.
Appends the contents of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object to this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlyActiveDirectorySchemaClassCollection"></xref> object that contains the objects to append to this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The object already exists in this collection.
schemaClasses is `null`.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
Determines if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is in this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
`true` if the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object is in this collection; otherwise, `false`.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
schemaClass is `null`.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

Copies all <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> objects that receives the elements of this collection.
The zero-based index in schemaClasses where this method starts copying this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
schemaClasses is `null`.
The index specified is out of range of the destination array.
Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object in this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to search for in this collection.
The zero-based index of the first matching object.
Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
schemaClass is `null`.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object into this collection at the specified index.
The zero-based index in this collection where the object is inserted.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to insert into this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The object already exists in this collection.
schemaClass is `null`.
The index specified is out of range of the collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object in this collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to get or set.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object that exists at the specified index.
The member already exists in this collection (applies to set only).
The item specified is `null` (applies to set only).
The index specified is out of range of this collection.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> specified has not yet been saved to the Active Directory Domain Services store (applies to set only).
Overrides the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete"></xref> method.
Overrides the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnInsertComplete(System.Int32,System.Object)"></xref> method.
The zero-based index at which the element was inserted.
The new value of the element at index.
Overrides the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnRemoveComplete(System.Int32,System.Object)"></xref> method.
The zero-based index at which the element was removed.
The element that was removed from this collection.
Overrides the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnSetComplete(System.Int32,System.Object,System.Object)"></xref> method.
The zero-based index at which the set operation occurred.
The element that was replaced by newValue.
The element that replaced oldValue.
Overrides the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnValidate(System.Object)"></xref> method.
The element to validate in this collection.
Removes the first occurrence of an object in this collection that is identical to the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object to remove from this collection.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The object does not exist in the collection.
schemaClass is `null`.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchemaClass"></xref> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
